name: gas power plant construction, combined cycle, 400MW electrical | gas power plant, combined cycle, 400MW electrical | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4268/documentation

New combined cycle power plant of 400MWe class. Data of reference power plant: gas turbine 265MWe, steam turbine 140MWe.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



The module includes the most important materials used for construction. It includes also the energy requirements for construction; transport is implicitly included in energy consumption. (Life time for operation assumed 180'000 h.)
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Average conditions for European combined cycle plants.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Best technology. Current gas turbine technology; other parts of power plant from literature 1996.
